title: Added mouse wheel handling for Forms.UWP
body:
This is for #449. I tried to implement it as easys as possible. I couldn't test it. Didn't get, how to do this.

An alternative would be to use djgtrams suggestions [here](https://forums.xamarin.com/discussion/124185/mouse-wheel-event). He uses Effects to get the wheel events.

> VS bug [#742851](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/742851)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I just have a question for Android... I _believe_ that they support mouse... somehow... I did a quick google and saw this: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11024809/how-can-my-view-respond-to-a-mousewheel

Has anyone ever used a mouse on an Android powered device? Do they even make Android tablets still? Anyway, if anyone has some device that supports mouse and knows something, feel free to comment :)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: I am going to merge. If anyone comes up with an Android with a mouse, I'll add that implementation to Android's code.
